remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要绘制在 Windows 窗体，应使用其中一个方法。To draw an on a Windows Form, you should use one of the methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在为使用 Windows 窗体。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms. 它是一个处理程序事件。It is a handler for the event. 一个对象传递给事件，用于在窗体上绘制图像。A object is passed to the event and is used to draw the image on the form. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 从名为 sampimag.jpg 位于同一个文件创建映像。Creates an image from a file named SampImag.jpg. 此文件必须位于应用程序可执行文件所在的文件夹。This file must be located in the same folder as the application executable file. - 创建在其中绘制图像的左上角的点。Creates a point at which to draw the upper-left corner of the image. - 在窗体上绘制不成比例的图像。Draws the unscaled image on the form. remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法允许使用此资源重新分配用于其他目的。Calling the method allows the resources used by this to be reallocated for other purposes. 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用，必须释放对所有引用这样垃圾回收器才能收回内存的占用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回多帧图像采取两种样式的相关信息： 多个页面和多个解决方法。This method returns information about multiple-frame images, which come in two styles: multiple page and multiple resolution. 多页映像是包含多个映像的映像。A multiple-page image is an image that contains more than one image. 每一页包含的单一映像 （或帧）。Each page contains a single image (or frame). 这些页面 （或映像或帧） 通常显示连续生成经过动画处理的序列，如动画的.gif 文件。These pages (or images, or frames) are typically displayed in succession to produce an animated sequence, such as an animated .gif file. 解决方法的多个映像是图像的包含多个不同的分辨率的副本的映像。A multiple-resolution image is an image that contains more than one copy of an image at different resolutions. 这常用的 MIP 映射其中显示的图像大小确定用于绘制的图像的分辨率。This is commonly used by MIP mapping where the displayed image size determines the resolution of the image used for drawing. [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] 可以支持任意数目的页 （或映像或帧），以及任意数量的解决方法。 can support an arbitrary number of pages (or images, or frames), as well as an arbitrary number of resolutions. 定义的维度是属性的。The defined dimensions are properties of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 托管 GDI + 具有内置编码器和解码器支持以下文件类型：Managed GDI+ has built-in encoders and decoders that support the following file types: - BMPBMP - GIFGIF - JPEGJPEG - PNGPNG - TIFFTIFF 该文件保持锁定状态，直到被释放。The file remains locked until the is disposed. 如果该文件不具有有效的图像格式，或如果[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]不支持的像素格式的文件，此方法将引发异常。If the file does not have a valid image format or if [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] does not support the pixel format of the file, this method throws an exception. > [!NOTE] > 类不支持在位图中的 alpha 透明度。The class does not support alpha transparency in bitmaps. 若要启用 alpha 透明度，可使用 32 位 / 像素的 PNG 图像。To enable alpha transparency, use PNG images with 32 bits per pixel. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用和方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the and methods. 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 若要运行此示例中，将其粘贴到窗体和处理该窗体通过调用事件`DemonstratePropertyItem`方法，传递`e`作为。To run this example, paste it into a form, and handle the form's event by calling the `DemonstratePropertyItem` method, passing `e` as . remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果编码器不存在的图像文件格式，则使用可移植网络图形 (PNG) 编码器。If no encoder exists for the file format of the image, the Portable Network Graphics (PNG) encoder is used. 当你使用方法将一幅图像保存为 Windows 图元文件格式 (WMF) 或增强型图元文件格式 (EMF) 文件中，将生成的文件另存为可移植网络图形 (PNG) 文件。When you use the method to save a graphic image as a Windows Metafile Format (WMF) or Enhanced Metafile Format (EMF) file, the resulting file is saved as a Portable Network Graphics (PNG) file. 出现此现象的原因[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]组件的[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]不具有可用于将文件另存为.wmf 或.emf 文件的编码器。This behavior occurs because the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] component of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] does not have an encoder that you can use to save files as .wmf or .emf files. 将图像保存到同一个文件从构造不允许，将引发异常。Saving the image to the same file it was constructed from is not allowed and throws an exception. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用方法。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method. 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 创建包含名为的按钮的窗体`Button5`。Create a form that contains a button named `Button5`. 将代码粘贴到窗体，并将方法与按钮的事件。Paste the code into the form, and associate the method with the button's event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 应避免将图像保存到用于构造它的同一个流。You should avoid saving an image to the same stream that was used to construct it. 执行此操作可能会损坏该流。Doing so might damage the stream. 图像必须保存到流中的偏移量为零。The image must be saved to the stream at an offset of zero. 如果之前保存图像中的任何其他数据已写入到流，流中的图像数据将被损坏。If any additional data has been written to the stream before saving the image, the image data in the stream will be corrupted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能值`dimensionID`参数是属性的。The possible values of the `dimensionID` parameter are properties of the . 可以使用这些标识图像按其时间、 解决方法或页码。These can be used to identify an image by its time, resolution, or page number. 调用此方法会导致对上一帧被放弃所做的所有更改。Calling this method causes all changes made to the previous frame to be discarded. 选择另一个帧之前, 保存到当前的框架，包括对像素值和属性所做的所有更改。Before selecting another frame, save all changes made to the current frame, including changes to pixel values and properties. 如果在调用方法就是成功 （异常不会发生），该方法将返回 0。If the call to the method is successful (an exception does not occur), the method will return 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果图像格式不支持属性项，此方法将引发并显示消息"不受支持的属性。"If the image format does not support property items, this method throws with the message "Property not supported." 如果图像格式支持属性项，但不支持您尝试设置的特定属性，此方法将忽略此尝试，但不会引发异常。If the image format supports property items but does not support the particular property you are attempting to set, this method ignores the attempt but does not throw an exception. 因为很难设置属性项类具有没有公共构造函数。It is difficult to set property items, because the class has no public constructors. 若要解决此限制的一种方法是获取通过检索属性值或调用方法的已具有属性项。One way to work around this restriction is to obtain a by retrieving the property value or calling the method of an that already has property items. 然后，可以将设置的字段并将其传递给。Then you can set the fields of the and pass it to . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用和方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the and methods. 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 若要运行此示例中，将其粘贴到窗体和处理该窗体通过调用事件`DemonstratePropertyItem`方法，传递`e`作为。To run this example, paste it into a form, and handle the form's event by calling the `DemonstratePropertyItem` method, passing `e` as .
